name: n8n-nodes-base.stravaTrigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Strava events occur

object.name: object
object.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

event.name: event
event.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the webhook-data only contain the Object ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

options.name: options
deleteIfExist
options.description: Strava allows just one subscription at all times. If you want to delete the current subscription to make room for a new subscription with the current parameters, set this parameter to true. Keep in mind this is a destructive operation.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。
